name: 3/4 sit-up
instructions: Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Lower your upper body back to the starting position.

name: 45Â° side bend
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended straight down by your sides.
Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, slowly bend your torso to one side, lowering your hand towards your knee.
Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.

name: Reverse Crunch
instructions: Lie flat on your back with your hands placed on the floor beside you.
Lift your legs off the ground, bending your knees at a 90-degree angle.
Engaging your lower abs, lift your hips off the ground towards your chest.
Lower your legs back down to the starting position.

name: Plank
instructions: Start in a push-up position with your arms straight.
Engage your core and maintain a straight line from head to heels.
Hold the position for as long as you can.
Avoid letting your hips sag or raising your buttocks too high.

name: Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands under your hips and legs straight.
Lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Engage your lower abs to raise your legs towards the ceiling.
Lower your legs back down without letting them touch the ground.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit on the ground with your knees bent and lean back slightly.
Hold your hands together in front of you and lift your feet off the ground.
Twist your torso to one side, bringing your hands towards the ground beside you.
Twist to the other side and repeat.

name: Mountain Climber
instructions: Start in a plank position with your arms straight.
Drive one knee towards your chest and then switch legs quickly.
Maintain a quick, controlled pace, alternating legs.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head and legs lifted off the ground.
Bring one knee towards your chest while twisting your torso to bring the opposite elbow towards the knee.
Switch sides, creating a pedaling motion with your legs.

name: Superman
instructions: Lie face down on the ground with your arms extended in front of you.
Lift your arms, chest, and legs off the ground simultaneously.
Hold the position briefly, squeezing your lower back muscles.
Lower your arms and legs back down to the starting position.

name: Windshield Wipers
instructions: Lie on your back with your arms extended to the sides.
Lift your legs off the ground and rotate them side to side in a controlled manner.
Keep your upper body on the ground and engage your core throughout the movement.

name: Hollow Body Hold
instructions: Lie on your back with your arms extended overhead and legs straight.
Lift your legs and upper body off the ground, forming a 'U' shape.
Hold the position, keeping your core engaged and lower back pressed into the ground.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on your side with your elbow directly beneath your shoulder.
Lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from head to heels.
Hold the position, engaging your obliques.
Switch sides and repeat.

name: Flutter Kicks
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands under your hips.
Lift your legs off the ground and perform quick, small kicks.
Keep your core engaged and maintain a steady pace.

name: Lying Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands under your hips.
Lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Lower your legs back down without letting them touch the ground.
